price: ¡Cuántas generaciones destruí antes que ellos! Solo imploraron cuando ya era demasiado tarde para salvarse [del castigo].
arabic: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن قَرۡنٖ فَنَادَواْ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kam ahlaknā min qablihim min qarnin fanādaw walāta ḥīna manāṣin
